page.title: 14Eaglesfield Village.
page.content: Eaglesfield is a small village with the village green called"the Puddle"in the centre.Most of the houses are old ones but about 25 have been built since 1965{John Dalton,}the famous scientist,who is responsible for the atomic theory and found out about colour blindness,was born in the village in 1766. Near the green is a pub called{'The Black Cock'.}Down the road from the pub is the village hall where they hold discos, meetings etc. At Bent Ash is a post office, open 5 mornings a week.{Gordon Litt}is the village's mechanic. His servicing garage is in the old Methodist Chapel. Another business in the village is {MacKays Plant Hire.}On Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays there is a mini bus service to Cockermouth and back. {Paddle School,}the primary school is one mile east of Eaglesfield.
